name: Tukky's Christmas
description:
An arcade platformer in the style of Wonderboy. Guide Tukky through a bunch of levels to safely deliver his stack of Christmas presents.

Avoid cats, bees and octopuses, or hit them with your car. Ride on clouds. Leap from struts. Collect Christmas paraphernalia for big rewards!

Yep, it's a TGF2 game and made at pretty much the last minute. Clean fun for all the family.
